## PHQ-9 vs CRISIS

When comparing questionnaires like PHQ-9 and CRISIS, researchers are faced with the time-consuming task of assessing the degree of relatedness and correlation between each instrument's items. Fortunately, an innovative solution is now available with Harmony. Harmony is a state-of-the-art tool that leverages natural language processing and generative AI to streamline this process, enabling researchers to efficiently match questionnaire items, even in multiple languages.


## Compare the items in PHQ-9 and CRISIS

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#___" target="harmonyapp">Import PHQ-9 and CRISIS into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#___" target="harmonyapp">Import just PHQ-9 into Harmony</a> - compare PHQ-9 with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#___" target="harmonyapp">Import just CRISIS into Harmony</a> - compare CRISIS with other instruments


## Discover the Ease of PHQ-9 vs CRISIS Comparison with Harmony

Harmony specializes in the harmonisation of questionnaires like PHQ-9 and CRISIS, thus taking the burden off the shoulders of researchers. By using Harmony's user-friendly web interface at https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app, researchers can either select instruments from the database or upload their own in PDF form. The AI-powered software then computes a percentage match between each item in PHQ-9 and CRISIS, making it easier than ever for psychologists to make accurate comparisons and draw insight from the data.

## Enhance Your PHQ-9 vs CRISIS Analysis with Harmony

With Harmony, you can take your analysis of PHQ-9 vs CRISIS to new heights, sans the stress of manual comparison. Harmony's AI capabilities afford researchers the unique advantage of repeatability across varied studies, allowing for consistency in results or the ability to detect differences in responses according to changing social conditions. This innovative tool is an indispensable companion for psychologists who want to maximize their productivity while maintaining the integrity and cohesion of their research.
